short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid obstacles, including cacti and pterodactyls by pressing the up and down keys
short.es: Evita los obstáculos, incluidos cactus y pterodáctilos, pulsando las teclas arriba y abajo.
short.fr: Évitez les obstacles, y compris les cactus et les ptérodactyles, en appuyant sur les touches haut et bas.
short.it: Evitate gli ostacoli, tra cui cactus e pterodattili, premendo i tasti su e giù.
short.ja: 上下キーでサボテンや翼竜などの障害物を避ける。
short.nl: Vermijd obstakels, zoals cactussen en pterodactylen, door op de omhoog- en omlaag-toetsen te drukken.
short.pl: Omijaj przeszkody, w tym kaktusy i pterodaktyle, naciskając przyciski w górę i w dół.
short.pt_BR: Evite obstáculos, incluindo cactos e pterodáctilos, pressionando as teclas para cima e para baixo
short.pt_PT: Evita obstáculos, incluindo cactos e pterodáctilos, premindo as teclas para cima e para baixo
short.ru: Избегайте препятствий, включая кактусы и птеродактилей, нажимая клавиши "вверх" и "вниз".
short.zh_CN: 按上下键避开仙人掌和翼手龙等障碍物

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension adds "The Runner Game" to your browser's toolbar, allowing you to play it within a popup area. To initiate the game, press the action button, and if you wish to stop, use the Escape key to close the popup.

How to Play:
By clicking on the action button, you can start the game, where you control a running character, such as a cat, using the space, up, or down keys to maneuver around obstacles. For additional options, right-click the action button to access the context menu.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_C:
This extension brings Google's Dinosaur Game, also known as T-Rex Game and Dino Runner to your browser toolbar area. Simply press the action button and play it inside the popup area. You can press the Escape key to close the popup and stop the game.

Acknowledgment:
The original game was created by Sebastien Gabriel in 2014.

How to play:
Click on the action button to launch the game in which the player controls a running dinosaur by pressing space, ? or ? keys to avoid obstacles, including cacti and pterodactyls. When the player reaches 700 points, the game begins to switch between day (white background, black lines, and shapes) and night (black background, white lines, and shapes).

Developer:
This extension runs the original WASM code in an isolated (sandboxed) window to protect your privacy
